subtitle: Serve this fish recipe with tagliatelle for a delightful meal.

method.text: Fill a large frying pan with the stock. Add the fish fillets, interleaving and alternating the two types of fish. Carefully poach for 3-5 min. Leave to cool a little. Then place onto a large, hot serving plate.
Reduce the cooking liquor by one quarter.
Meanwhile, saute the shallot in the oil for 2 min. Pour in the stock. Take off the heat and whisk in the cream, egg yolk and vermouth. Season to taste.
Stir the herbs into the sauce. Reheat and serve with the fish.
